Every moment is beautiful

My name is Jeff, a Front-end Web Designer based in Kitchener-Waterloo specializing in UX and Interaction Design. I am known for my progressive dedication to refinement, craftsmanship, and attention to detail.

My continuous improvements in Adobe CS, HTML5, CSS3, and JS frameworks allow me to streamline my workflows to design, code, and optimize prototypes from scratch. Like an artisan in the world of haute couture, I strive for the best, effective, customized designs tailored to your clients' needs.

Adapting to the ever-changing user requirements, I continuously monitor key performance indicators (KPI) and update my skill sets to design, develop, and refine digital assets. The goal is to create a positive user experience by paying attention down to the most minor of details. Your clients and competition doesn't sit still. Why should your designer?

The step-by-step iterative approach

01

Research

Brainstorming, personas, user stories, competitive analysis, value proposition

02

Ideation

Mood boards, colour and material selection, typography, technology

03

Concepts

Wireframes, mockups, prototypes, interactions, user testing

04

Development

Coding, user testing, design and interaction refinements, optimization

Client focused, maximum impact

Not every designer notices patterns after years of experience communicating and understanding the needs of different end-users in various industries. Going through numerous customer personas, journeys, and behaviour, I came to the realization that our attention spans are getting shorter as we advance through the digital age. As a result, I follow an approach to create the most impactful and memorable experiences. That approach is creating transparent, minimalistic, simple, and efficient designs.

My contemporary design philosophy, along with my knowledge in coding, UX, and Interaction Design, will allow me to deliver maximum impact to your clients. I have followed this approach to design high-fidelity mockups, UI, e-blasts, banners, and wireframes for clients at Sun Life Financial, DossierView, various tech startups, and BMO Financial Group.

It starts here

Let’s collaborate and create something amazing for your customers. From Web banners, e-blasts, prototypes, mockups, design concepts to development, I am ready to bring value to your creative endeavours.

Thank you for your visit.
